so the problem with that project is that our company was built using design systems but when you design a component

using the react project of your project or anything project they are very cross framework compatible

not javascript dependence which is the main reason i built it with html and css because on the off chance that someone

the page i wanted to ensure that they could still receive content with web components you have the same downfall
that you have with react or view or whatever which is that any content that people see on your page is dependent on
